description.action: Now fully transformed into a brown owl, standing proud with wings spread, ready to take flight and lead the escape.
His form shimmers and transforms into a small but fierce dinosaur with sharp teeth, standing upright and looking determined and confident.
Transforms into a fluffy gray koala, his new animal form making him appear stronger and more self-assured than his human form.
Shifts into a black and white panda, her transformation complete as she stands confidently alongside the other animal children.
